scripts.start: sls sls simulate apigateway -p 5000 # update the port here
scripts.deploy: sls deploy --stage ${STAGE:-staging} --aws-s3-accelerate # serverless.yml sets the stage locally to `development` but we never want to deploy there and default to `staging`
scripts.package: lerna run --scope='@hbkapps/serverless-node-*' --ignore='@hbkapps/serverless-node-utils-*' package # run the `npm run package` script on all functions
scripts.test:depcheck: lerna run test:depcheck # run depcheck tests (`npm test:depcheck`) on each updated module
